website_summaries.verdict: Starting with seeds and including ample accessories, this kit has what you need to start your bonsai project; but it also has some quality concerns.
pros: This kit stands out for the wooden box that's perfect for storing the tools and accessories, including markers and pruning shears, that come with it
cons: Pots are poorly made and prone to cracking
Some seeds have been known to not sprout
Kits have arrived with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: A neat little kit for anyone who loves gardening.
customer_reviews.text: A great little kit. To date 3 of my seed types have sprouted, I’m hoping the 4th will as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: out of the 4 starter pots, 2 of the delonix sprouted and grew within 3 weeks. two of the pinus also grew within 4 weeks, but stalled in growth another week after that. i repotted the 2 delonix and they are still steadily growing. the pinus havent done much. as for the other two species, i havent seen anything at all. i still have more seeds so i try again but with regular potting mix
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he thought it was the most awesome thing when he opened it! He loves growing plants inside and he’s always wanted a bonsai tree. Can’t wait to see them come up!
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: A fun time growing plants
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting this kit because a co-worker also started a bonsai tree kit and we wanted to see who could grow them better. I bit this one because I like the setup and the ratings made it seem like a good one. I have had success with 3 of the 4 trees growing but overall the instructions were good and the kit is great. I would recommend it to the others.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is just SO cool and cute!! I’m going to order more for gifts for People! I ordered for myself originally, and now ordering more. This is just so perfect and easy and only 20$! You get four different trees to start in the sweetest burlap sacs. So easy to use, great quality and all in a cool wooden box. Can’t go wrong! And shipped super fast! So great for anyone wanting to start growing their own tree or add to the collection. Very happy with purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: brittany sobczak

customer_reviews.title: Dang it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the knowledge for this. So there should be no reason in the world that only one seed sprouted out of all. Thus, one star. It was all packed well; therefore, the setup was right. The seeds just failed me except one. Tough luck. When I first saw it, I definitely wanted to gift it. Since they didn't grow but one, how could I trust it? I am an honest reviewer and wouldn't want to make anyone look bad. This was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Scott kelley

customer_reviews.title: Super easy & fun
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit a few days ago and was so excited to plant. It's super simple and the instructions make it even simpler. I cant wait for them to start growing. I would recommend this to anyone!! Update...so I have planted some seeds and have had all but one of the seeds grow. I'm super excited to keep watching them all grow and will update when I try to grow the extra seeds I saved.
customer_reviews.author: Epotter10

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for My Girl
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend doesn't have a hobby other than skincare which is almost every girl. Myself, I have about 10 hobbies. So I figured for Christmas, I would buy her a hobby. I gifted her this set, she was thrilled, said it was very thoughtful and useful. Fast forward mid pandemic and she finally cracked into it. She really enjoyed the process and is already talking about needing a full garden. Out of the two types of seeds she planted, only one of them grew. Well, about 2 of the 8 seeds actually sprouted in total. But we are both excited for this process and enjoy watching how rapidly it grows in our kitchen window.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: It's fun, give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Two never grew. One was growing beautifully, but, my cat ate it. Really comes down to the genetics of the seeds, which they give you plenty of in case the first doesn't grow or your cat is a twat. Still love him though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The pictures I uploaded were my first round of seeds sprouting. I just transplanted my flame tree sprout to its permanent pot this morning. This photo is after only three weeks since planting. All of these seedlings were planted on 6/5/2019. Bonus: the Facebook community associated with this set are very supportive and helpful as well! Everyone posts photo updates and shares tips/tricks. My 3yo old son has been helping with the growing process and is extremely proud of the seedlings so far as well. It’s a great bonding experience for us!
customer_reviews.author: Derakh

customer_reviews.title: Don't get your hopes up
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to the letter and was really excited to see the Flame tree and the Rocky mountain pine sprout and grow but sadly the Black spruce and Brazilian rosewood seeds never sprouted I planted them all the same day in 10/21/2018 its now 11/21/18 and not even a root i hope that i will be able to get a new set of seeds when i contact the company
customer_reviews.author: Brian Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Basic kit looks fun.
customer_reviews.text: So this is a first time I'm trying to grow a bonsai. Looked through directions seemed like it was a cut in paste for all the plants sent I think 1 had a different burriel depth than the other 3 1/8th vs the others 1/16th. Giving them the benefit of the doubt going to try it there way with half seeds if they don't work out I've already started watching videos for the second round. So we will see looks fun really basic kit there's wires and more tools necessary if you really get into it. Will put another update if the plants make it.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: The packaging tho
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is so cute and thoughtful. Shredded paper to take up space so things aren’t bouncing around; a tray at the bottom to keep it all neat, and the tiny branded lined pots are adorable. Love when the packaging gets me excited for what’s next. For those that are worried about your ability to keep it alive, the instructions are very detailed and I’m actually hopeful... love the mini signs for each plant. They’re wooden and printed and stained. Every detail is on point!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for a starting place
customer_reviews.text: The varieties in the pack all take special research to grow properly and all died when followed package instructions. I don't recommend the soil, it grows mold quickly. Most of the seeds did sprout. I bought a book on bonsai and re-ordered seeds from elsewhere to try again. I also started them in seed starters with lids. Its a great idea, but anyone who is serious will probably use their own growing methods.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: NO BLACK PINE GERMINATION
customer_reviews.text: Seeds didn't germinate. Followed instructions to the "T". Sowed for over 3 months - ZERO. Epic fail and I will never buy again. Worthless. I start from seed all my annual flowers and veggies for years. Warming mats, grow lights and misting devices. I have a clue what I am doing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Unknown Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit back when they were labeled with the species of seeds... I purchased this kit as they looked interesting. Found out that they apparently just threw random seeds in the package and called them whatever they wanted to. My trees are now 1.5-2 or more higher and they do not match the kit. Bristle cone pine was the majority of the seeds... even though they were not actually included in the kit I bought. Maybe they never thought they would grow large enough to tell?! haha. No complaints on the trees that have grown, just how it was marketed.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bonsai tree kit and wooden box! Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Got it as a gift for my wife bc she likes this sort of thing. We were both so impressed with the quality, packaging and instructions. Wooden box it all came in was awesome. Can’t wait to see the bonsai trees once they grow. We had not ordered from Garden Republic before, but we definitely will again... they know what they’re doing. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this product!
customer_reviews.text: The box and packaging were beautiful when they arrived! It was also so quick that I was put in a good mood by that alone. The instructions are super easy to understand and are a quick read, and even though i had a few problems along the way, the seller helped me through it! A dedicated staff and eye for details and style really make this a unique and amazing product and has made me a loyal customer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal G.

customer_reviews.title: every variety gave me a sproutlet!
customer_reviews.text: so, pretty expensive i think but an awesome product/gift. i am not a gardener and have no tree experience. that said, i followed their very precise instructions and got all four varieties of tree to sprout. some had 6-8 sprouts even, though some only got 2 or 1. i gave the saplings too much sun though, and fried 2 out of the 4 trees. totally my fault - this kit will (over several years) get you bonsais
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: a fancy presentation, but seeds do not germinate - update
customer_reviews.text: Many months after that initial purchase of this kit where nothing germinated, and after contacting the manufacturer, they sent me a replacement kit free of any additional charges. I am growing this kit, and things are going well. So, their customer service is good and the kits do work. Just thought I'd follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Choper

customer_reviews.title: Five star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to start growing in a very cute box. I had some questions at the very beginning so I emailed the company - got a detailed response within a day or two. Had more questions and was answered promptly again. One of my seed packets did not come up so they are sending more. NOTE- the Flame Tree seeds - sand them with sand paper before soaking (they are a very hard seed) and then plant horizontal/vertical, instead of planting them straight down like it says. Very fun project. Thank you to Ava in customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: Patience & research is important.
customer_reviews.text: Good setup for starter kit. The pinus Aristata has sprouted, and I planted the seeds 9/1. Still waiting for the others. Bonsai are tricky and temperamental so I am just being patient and taking all this as a learning experience. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line - not worth it (updated review)
customer_reviews.text: Seeds sprouted. But not worth it as there’s not much to help you get started. Didn’t even tell me what I would need. Kept referring to a phone number to call for tips and help. Wouldn’t have bought A STARTER KIT if I knew it didn’t come with instructions. Or rocks. Or screen/mesh partitions. Or pots with drainage. Countless cheaper/better options for these same seeds out there. That’s all i found useful, the seeds, but not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Seeds did not germinate
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute kit but the seeds failed to germinate.
customer_reviews.author: KWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Not a good place to start for bonsai
customer_reviews.text: Bonsai is not what you think it is. If you are actually interested in it, please check out the bonsai subreddit. Its a really fun thing to do, but sadly growing them from seeds isn't an easy task. Please do some research on bonsai before you make any purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Catlin

customer_reviews.title: Great little start kit! **UPDATE** thumbs way down!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if this would work, but 3 of the 4 have sprouted, the 4th may still come in. Plus you have more seed to use after the first ones grown. I like watching them grow! 05/15/2019 Update: I never did get the 4th one to grow at all. I was able to get 3 of one type to grow, they grew for a month and died. I got 4 for one type to grow, they grew for about 2 months then started dying, there’s one of the 4 still fighting for life. Last I 5 of the last type, 3 months and still looking well.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Expert Squared

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get ahold of sellers and seeds where a bust
customer_reviews.text: I had one species of seed sprout but all else failed. I’m aware of moisture levels needed to germinate and near to none of the seeds sprouted. There isn’t an option to contact sender in order to request seeds to replace and am very disappointed :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited and hopeful when I got this product but I'm not impressed. I sowed all the seeds on 2/10/19 and to date(3-13-19) only 2 plants have sprouted. I moved the pinus aristata to a bigger pot and it seems to be growing well. I noticed mold growing on the soil of the delonix regia today so that ones done. The jacaranda mimosifolia hasn't sprouted. The packaging is cool and I really like the look of the product but that's about it. I'm going to try a second grow so we'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Payton

customer_reviews.title: Missing seeds
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was sent the new seed pack, but 3 of the 4 seeds never bloomed. I spoke with seller, but issue was never resolved... One seed pack was completely missing, 1 pack only had two seeds, and 1 is not growing. One of them is doing very well though. I contacted company through my warranty card twice and have yet to even receive a reply.... these were a gift to me for my son and he was very excited when we planted them together because he knows how I love tthings like this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Xmas gift to my son-in-law. He has a bonsai that he’s had for quite a few years and for his birthday last year I got him a new pot, soil & fertilizer for that tree. I thought he would enjoy growing his own from seeds. He just sent me this pic today. They seem to be doing quite well I think. Looks like the flowering one hasn’t even sprouted though. 😩 He’s happy with the gift and, ultimately, THAT is what matters!
customer_reviews.author: elameg

customer_reviews.title: Friend Loved This Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a male friend who recently started learning about Bonsai and really enjoys starting trees from seed. He absolutely loved this gift! I cannot vouch for the seed viability but will report back once he starts them. The packaging looked great and the instructions are very clear. Would reccommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit from Amazon and have had great luck growing the plants (so far). However, my kit was missing the signs that were supposed to be included to identify what was in the pot. I contacted them and they promised to send it to me, it has been a couple of weeks and nothing, there are to many others on Amazon to put up with this. My advice, buy a different kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Temple

customer_reviews.title: Neat gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiance and she loves it. Had difficulty growing a couple of the bonzais at first but it was due to her error and after her getting help from the community on Facebook she has a flame tree that is doing very well and she's excited to plant the Brazilian rosewood next. It's a great gift idea. Would reccomend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Banks

customer_reviews.title: Trees for days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier!!! Their quoted germination rates are lower than I got for everything but the rosewood. 100% of the seeds germinated (still waiting But still very impressed with this little kit) and much faster than the materials sent with the seeds. This is a great gift idea and I have found a new go to for seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Charais

customer_reviews.title: Fun but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Fun. But more than half my seeds did not sprout. Careful of mold that can grow easily with the soil provided for some reason. I had to report sooner than I would have liked to help provide some more air for the plants than the little plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: They dont send bad seeds.
customer_reviews.text: They dont send bad seeds. Some of us just dont have a green thumb! Seedlings and germination are crucial start for a healthier plant life. Dont plan to follow given instructions you will need to improvise! Good luck! Great kit!
customer_reviews.author: Core

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely packaged and good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packed for a gift. The seeds did not grow well outside but seem to be doing well indoors under a grow light. They also offer replacement seeds, which I had to do after they failed to grow outside, for a small shipping charge. The replacements are doing well and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bradon F.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love how nice this kit looks. My husband has wanted to try growing a bonsai tree for awhile but most of the other kits just looked to kid-friendly. My husband does custom wood working so I loved the box this came in. It looks just as nice in person and I can't wait to give it to him for Christmas! I will update my review once he starts the process.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn89

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to grow a bunch of different types of trees succulents things like that inside my house, I love growing bonsai trees, every single one of mine did not grow. I was short a bunch of seeds as well, I literally followed every instruction I was super bummed out
customer_reviews.author: kellyantonia11

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai tree starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my brother who had been wanting one for a while. This product is amazing. It’s such great quality for the price and it comes with so much. Different seeds with name tags and a box to store everything in. It was perfect. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Some plants didn't grow.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit because of the good reviews. Two of my plants grew, the other two didn't. A little disappointed. Was wondering if the company will send me more seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gangler

customer_reviews.title: Cute- moderately underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: The seeds were in good shape, the clippers are SO DULL they won’t do anything, one of my planting sides is broken in half and the other half isn’t even in the box so that is weird but the box is beautiful- I looked this up ahead of time and didn’t use the soil disks and used my own bonsai mix for planting- just planted last night so not sure how things will grow yet but I may update this depending on that
customer_reviews.author: Bonsai-growth.is.a.cut.away

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful All Around Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit was way more than I expected it to be. The wooden box that everything came on is a fantastic additional accessory. It was well packaged and we'll informative. I really hope these seeds do well. I will add more once they start to grow.
customer_reviews.author: RonnieJohn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a mother's day gift and my mom couldn't have been happier. Came in a nice ornate wooden box, neat and tidy packaging, detailed instructions on how to grow said plant/tree. Would definitely order again and have already browsed other items
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality plant starting kit.
customer_reviews.text: The kit is well packaged with easy to follow instructions. After about 3 weeks, all four bonsai species started sprouting. Also helpful is the FaceBook group with hints and support. Garden Republic offers great support and customer service. Well worth the price! Suitable for beginner or experienced gardeners.
customer_reviews.author: mark bielat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun to grow
customer_reviews.text: First time growing bonsai from seeds, I'm extremely happy with the so far outcome, I placed 5 seeds of each and 3 out of 4 bonsai sprouted (the 4th one is 45 days to germinate). I have some left over seeds, product is very good and quality and the website is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Frpbuttlerfly

customer_reviews.title: Nope, cant rely on 100% failure
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these as a gift from me, she was excited and proud to try and grow her new baby trees. They all fucken died, and fast.... they sprout then wilt... i even bought a book for $5 showing you steps to take (not included in this purchase), but they all died... love the idea, but they claim a high percentage of proved growth? While did they all die? Im not that unlucky
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Norrena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey as seeds are cheap but i bought it mostly for the soil. I did not want to go and make a bunch of the soil for something i wasn't sure would work. The flame tree instructions are not entirely right. You have to score the seeds for them to germ. Look it up its easy, but do be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit but many seeds did not sprout
customer_reviews.text: I really like the kit and I followed all of the institutions but still have found that about half of the seeds will never sprout. I have plenty of seedlings from the blue and black spruce seeds but have not been successful with Brazilian rosewood or the flame tree seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and seems like really high quality
customer_reviews.text: I will come back in 2 years and let you know how well it grows but so far it looks pretty amazing. Their support seems pretty good too, I registered my seeds online and they give you a warranty to replace any seeds that do not germinate - so that's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Emad Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Great housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me this kit as a housewarming gift when we moved into our new home and I'm so excited to try it out with the kids! It's truly a complete kit and very well thought-out, down to the plastic-lined burlap planters. I'll update this review once our seeds sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Seeds Never Sprouted
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought the Bonsai Tree Starter kit because we wanted to grow our own Bonsai trees. But with much disappointment and despite following the directions exactly and taking extreme care for the planted seeds, none of them ever sprouted. Very disappointing, it’s been over 2 months and we’ve been forced to give up on our Bonsai dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to do, but the Angels at Customer Service help all the way through!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience was a disaster but after contacting customer service, they were extremely patient and helpful. After 8 months I now have my bonsai growing big and the ones who didn't want to sprout, being replaced. I HIGHLY recommend them. They have the best people in customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Barros

customer_reviews.title: If you are trying to grow real bonsai trees this is not for you!!
customer_reviews.text: I talked to actual bonsai tree professionals and showed them this product asking why my trees had such little success. He told me these kits are lying to you on how for example some of these trees would take over 20 years to grow into what the appear on the covers. The success rate is also super low and the overall things (pots, soil) included aren't the optimal ingredients to grow a successful bonsai tree. If you want to have fun trying to grow a tree that is the most this kit could do. If you are actually intending to grow successful bonsai trees do your research and you probably want to buy pre grown trees.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Padula

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait for full growth
customer_reviews.text: So at first they weren’t growing (we had to buy a growing light) and now they’re growing so nicely! We lost all hope at first but I’m glad we continue try. (Btw it brings a bunch of soil, recommend to only use one at a time while adding water).
customer_reviews.author: J Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Spend all this money to get one growth.
customer_reviews.text: One one sewed sprouted. I could aube bought one that’s as already started. I do have a green thumb. I just thought it was easy to buy everything combined since you have this in one of my homes The studio apt in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: If I was wanting a kit to plant any type of greenery this company is where it's at!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I've been wanting to the T. I've been really looking into growing bonsai seeds and I looked around on Amazon and seen this starter kit and thought man you cant beat this price for everything it comes with. They include more than enough seeds to start off with, a trimming shear, nice little wooden markers to jot down the name and date the specific seeds were planted, four nice bags, and even some dirt to go with it. It also has a small book that's a good beginner's guide to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew k.

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit and will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, it comes with everything you need to start with. This is my first time trying this but so far so good. It was easy to use and comes with clear instructions. The pictures I added are after one week of receiving the kit. I water once a day and put it in the sun for an average of 5 hr a day. I’m planning on getting more soon. As growing these trees are teaching me patience.
customer_reviews.author: Jafar Bahjat

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would have worked!😥
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this and was so excited! Apparently these seeds have to germinate for over a month at certain temperatures depending on the seed. I don't know a beginner who is equipped right off the bat for that. If I had climate control equipment this would have been perfect! Unfortunately I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: LRig

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to germinate seeds and start a bonsai garden. Garden Republic is the best company I've seen yet that satisfied all my questions in one shot. Everything one needs to know, grow and take care of bonsais is in their complete setup. It's perfect. Couldn't have asked for anything better and they have a website to aide in your growing enthusiasm. Thank you Garden Republic!!
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé since he really enjoys gardening. So far, he’s liked the quality of the packaging, tools to help get started, and chance to try something new! I’m really excited to add this cute addition to our plants. And, the display is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alexi randel

customer_reviews.title: Best Bonsai starter kit on the online market!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the packaging and how the box doubles as a compact, neat little growing station! I love the personal touch that came on the back of the brochure, talking about the origin of your business and your story. The instructions are thoroughly clear on how to start a new bonsai adventure. I am currently soaking the seeds and I am excited to see the new trees begin to grow. I will keep you updated
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Draper

customer_reviews.title: If you want pine trees this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks to make sure I could give the best review possible. The pine variety was the only one to sprout after almost a month of waiting, so far I have 4 sprouts that are all pretty healthy but for thirty dollars I expected to get at least two varieties of trees :/
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: This kit has everything you need to get 4 beautiful bonsai trees going!
customer_reviews.text: My brother you still live maintaining little bonsai trees. So here I am 20 years later giving it a try! This kit has everything I need. Eventually, I will probably transfer to a different container if all goes well, but for now I just want to see if I can get some started. Adorable little box that I plan to re-purpose! Such an economical and find a way to get started on this new adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Good kit bad seeds
customer_reviews.text: Great grow set, problem was non of my seeds sprouted. Followed the directions to a tee and even used a grow light. Had they sprouted would be an awesome gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: i want to start up a bonsai and I trying it out. it is growing now two different plants i set up the juniper and the red flame tree love the packaging with the wooden box
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: With thumbs that are no shade of green to speak of, I never had much hope of keeping plants alive before getting this kit. The instructions are clear and easy to follow, there’s plenty of seeds for a second attempt should things go wrong, and buyers are encouraged to register their seeds before planting should they require assistance at any time. And it’s all self-contained, the box comes with plastic lining so the seedlings can sit all together in it. Very satisfied and excited to see my babies grow!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The sacks they give you to plant the seeds in will mold (and I live in a very dry climate); there is no proper draining. I also did not find the informational kit and instructions to be all that helpful. I had 3 of my 4 pots sprout, and now only 2 pots have survived. You will also need to transfer the plant shortly after they sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Margolf

customer_reviews.title: Happy out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box everything looks great. Included in the box is an instruction book and registration card, 4 soil disc's, 4 burlap grow bags, 4 signes and a set of pruning scissors. The box itself has a plastic liner to put the burlap grow bags right inside so sprout the seeds. A real all in one setup to get your bonsai seeds started. Cannot wait to get these growing. Will update along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Doepker

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai Kit
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very recently, but it is too early for any results. The product was well packed and arrived in very good condition. I have no complaints. M.Jolly
customer_reviews.author: Margrit Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Hear me out:
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind all seeds are different and probably will sprout differently... Here's my results, over the course of 2 months my flame tree grew the most still a sapling, Brazilian rosewood didn't germanite or sprout after using 4 seeds(still waiting), black spruce sprouting but a bit slower than the flame tree seed, and the last seed also is in limbo.. similar to the Brazilian rosewood seed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bonsai kit for my mom for Christmas despite several negative reviews about nothing growing, or only some of the seeds growing. My mom has a green thumb so I gave it a shot anyway. She planted them all recently within the last month and this is the growth so far. All 4 have sprouted and seem to be doing great. She didn’t do anything special - just followed the directions. Very happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing birthday bonsai
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter after researching and reviewing. What a let down. This is not as easy to grow as they make it seem. Constantly battling mold because the box blocks the sun light. We barely added a few drops of water when we were watering so that wasn't the issue. Poor planet design.
customer_reviews.author: Rony Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful beginning!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for the kit were extremely helpful, and the little booklet included helped with a lot of information on what to expect in terms of germination and what to do to help it along. It's been a little over a week and I'm just starting to see the first hints of sprouts from some of my bristlecone pine seeds. The kit as a self-contained starter that really doesn't require much of anything in the way of extra stuff to get started is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai fun
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 4 are growing. I’m not sure why the one hasn’t, but, I have extra seeds And Will try again. These is a really nice set. I got my sister one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D. McCaskey

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, but Seeds are DUDS
customer_reviews.text: Did everything as directed to the letter. I kept all environment conditions for proper germination of the seeds and it has been weeks and nothing has sprouted. This is a dud. Heard from other buyers that they've experienced the same thing. I want a refund of this defective product. Aesthetically everything looks good, but if ultimately the product does not work...what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Darling

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the packaging, super simple and earthy. I wish the instructions were easier to follow. I had to do some personal research and found out you have to freeze and shock the seeds then start the germination process. I did love the information they provided about each tree so I can know when the growth will be expected! Super excited for my first experience growing from the seed!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Only one of the four seed types sprouted
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my boyfriend who wanted some desk plants to cultivate. He loved the box it came in, it was very aesthetically pleasing and great to hold other item. Unfortunately, only the pine seeds from the kit sprouted.... This was a little disappointing. The pinus aristata trees are doing very well though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very nice product. It comes in a very nice wooden box and was shipped faster than what I was expecting , it was in high demand and out of stock when I purchased , but I already knew that. But they were able to fulfil the Order even faster than what was expected
customer_reviews.author: PattyK

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know if it's easy to grow I just planted the seeds. It's a lot of fun if you have children over a certain age. Also a really cool package the box it comes in is the coolest. Can't wait for my seeds to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Kits really cool. A little more growing info wouldve been good. All in all pretty neat setup. I got the Delonix Regina to sprout, but its the only one so far...hopefully the other three kinds follow.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Cute box, but that’s all you’ll get!
customer_reviews.text: None of the “seeds” worked! Bought this as a gift for my son, who has a GREEN thumb and can help almost anything grow. Warning to anyone thinking about this purchase, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Hope4usyet

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying watching my bonsai plant grow!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to see my bonsai seed growing into a little plant. I look forward to continuing ur seeing it grow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: 1 for a gift 1 for me
customer_reviews.text: Having a lot of fun planting with my son. These are great sets for starting the seeds and when I replant them I reuse the pots for other plant seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Not get unless you have a green thumb
customer_reviews.text: I spent way to much for me to follow the instructions to the T and all of my seeds not grow highly upset
customer_reviews.author: Bromista Davis

customer_reviews.title: So far so great 👍
customer_reviews.text: So far so great Packaging! Packaging came exactly as pictured and arrived early. Directions are clear (with only one typo :) )and detailed. Just started soaking seeds, but very optimistic. Looking forward to updating to 5 stars after seedlings sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai Brilliance!
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately enamored by this kit. It arrives in an engraved wooden box with all the pieces clearly labeled. The instructions are clear and unambiguous, so you never second-guess yourself through the process. It comes with a copious amount of seeds to allow for mistakes, and they even have a warranty if your tree never grows. I can't recommend this highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Swalwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice hobby starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed receiving the package and going through all the extra accessories and checking out the seeds, when I realized I was missing the entire booklet on how to use the contents. Would have been a 5 star if not for the missing booklet. EDIT: The sellers kindly contacted me and I promptly received an eBook copy of the booklet along with some helpful tips : ) Instant 5-star
customer_reviews.author: Grant Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Still reviewing
customer_reviews.text: I have just planted my trees so i can’t give a full truthful star review but i will review again once my plants start growing. One of my seed packets did not have any seeds in it so i was disappointed but it was not worth the headache of returning the whole thing because my two second graders that i bought the plants for to go along with their home school science lesson was too excited to plant them.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Seeds didn’t sprout.
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging and presentation. Poor quality seeds. Nothing sprouted. Followed directions perfectly. It’s more of a Jocelyn not quality product. Don’t waste money.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is so easy to use and comes packaged so cute! I can't wait for my little baby trees!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Mama

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone. They loved it, but it requires time and patience to appreciate! 3 out of the 4 seed types grew on the first try. The 4th one failed, but we tried again with seeds that we didn't use on the first attempt, and it eventually sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The box is super cute, and I love how labeled and instructed everything is. They even give you a warranty which is awesome. The kit provides a lot of neat basic things like soil, shears, and the fabric pots which are also really nice. I bought one for my boyfriend and after reading and seeing what was inside the box I decided to buy one myself. Going to start growing today, wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was very nice, and the instructions (plus videos and supplements online) made it simple to start growing. All of our seed types germinated within a couple of weeks and are now growing strong! My family has been excited to watch the changes and growth and we hope to be trimming in a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing costumers service!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small problem with them sprouting but costumer service is great and talking me through it when I contacted them about getting replacement seeds..so I'm going to try what they told me ..I love their costumer service its AMAZING I'm buying these for everyone just really great thanks for the great product and helping us people that weren't born with a green thumb lol
customer_reviews.author: kristina m.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift and even more amazing customer support
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for a birthday or for Christmas. I had a problem with one of the bonsai trees not growing so I reached out to the company, and they were amazing! They gave me tips on how to provide the best environment for the bonsai tree to grow, and they sent me a replacement kit that had multiple different seeds in it. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product!!!....This sellers items will make your wildest dreams come true
customer_reviews.author: martin janca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this item is incredible. Very gift worthy! The box is sturdy and print is very cute! I will be looking forward to getting started! My kids will enjoy planting these and watching them grow. Delivery was prompt and packaging secure. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my girlfriend and she loved it. She struggled to grow them, having to replace them multiple times, but the customer support was supportive and friendly, giving her new seeds and a fresh new try. She really liked the kit and told me to leave a nice review to the bonsai people. Yet after 3 failed attempts, an overall a great gift and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avinh Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointing gift for the money. Smaller than imagined it would be. Seems like a scam
customer_reviews.author: Engineer IndyJoe

product_meta.title: Bonsai Tree Seed Starter Kit - Mini Bonsai Plant Growing Kit, 4 Types of Seeds, Potting Soil, Pots, Pruning Shears Scissor Tool, Plant Markers, Wood Gift Box, Indoor Garden Gardening Gifts Idea
feature_bullets: 🌱 BONSAI TREE KIT - 4 types miniature bonsai tree seeds, 4 bonsai soil potting mix pods, 4 burlap bonsai pots or grow bags with sewn-in liners, 4 printed bamboo plant markers for bonsai plant name & Sowed-On Date, 1 bonsai tools, instructions, How-To Video link, wooden gift box or planter box

💯 100% NON GMO, GROWN IN USA - Our bonsai starter kits include: Jacaranda Mimosifolia - Brazilian Rosewood. Picea Pungens Glauca San Juan - Colorado Blue Spruce. Delonix Regia - Flame Tree. Picea Mariana - Black Spruce
🎁 UNIQUE GIFT IDEA - Our bonzai tree grow kits are perfect unique gifts for women & men for plant therapy, fun hobby for kids or adults, office plant, desk plant, garden gifts for gardeners
❤️ BONSAI TREE STARTER KIT FOR EVERYONE -  Our Japanese Bonsai Kit is perfect for all experience levels, plus enough seeds to plant a second time if you make a mistake

💯 QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST - Our indoor garden kit for growing outdoor, indoor real live bonsai trees is tested at the highest germination rates available for that tree seed type on the market. This ensures you are getting freshly harvested seeds that give you the best success rate for your bonsai growing journey
